General.Name: Ambassador Hotel Ltd
General.Description: The Ambassador Hotel,Ltd. operates hotels and restaurants under the Ambassador Hotels, A CUT STEAKHOUSE, and Corner Bakery63 brands in Taiwan. Its facilities include restaurants, cafes, bars, and clubs. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 63, Zhongshan North Road, Taipei, Taiwan
